price: Ẹ má ṣe kọ́lẹ, ẹ má ṣe banújẹ́; ẹ̀yin l’ẹ máa lékè tí ẹ bá jẹ́ onígbàgbọ́ òdodo.
arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَلَا تَحۡزَنُواْ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walā tahinū walā taḥzanū wa-antumu al-aʿlawna in kuntum mu'minīna
